item.title: Markov chain transition probability written in Python
item.description: # 1.First of all I write an article about transition probability of Markov chain. Specifically, I will introduce a function that calculates the transition probability from time series data and makes it a matrix. Note that this is not an introduction to a function that does this for a Markov chain transition probability matrix. I will write detailed information from “2. What is Markov chain?” If you want to know only the code, I think that it is enough to refer from “3.
